author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Beilu Pharmaceutical to pay 2017 dividend on April 16
text:
April 10(Reuters) - Beijing Beilu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.37 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 13
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 16 and the dividend will be paid on April 16
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Em1sGe
